text: The 1991 edition of the Women's Handball Tournament of the African Games was the 3rd, organized by the African Handball Confederation and played under the auspices of the International Handball Federation, the handball sport governing body. The tournament was held, in Cairo, Egypt, contested by 6 national teams and won by Angola. ==Draw== {| class="wikitable" width=25% !width=50%|Group A !width=50%|Group B |- |valign=top| |valign=top| |} ==Preliminary round== ==Knockout stage== ;Championship bracket ==Final ranking== {|class=wikitable style="text-align:center;" |- !Rank !!width=170|Team |- |Image:Gold medal icon.svg |align=left| Angola |- |Image:Silver medal icon.svg |align=left| |- |Image:Bronze medal icon.svg |align=left| |- |4 |align=left| |- |5 |align=left| |- |6 |align=left| |} ==Awards== ==References== ==External links== * Official website Handball at the 1991 All-Africa Games Category:Women's handball in Egypt Category:1991 in women's handball Category:Handball at the African Games
title: Handball at the 1991 All-Africa Games – Women's tournament
